previous.title: Cashless societies would be more efficient, but also more vulnerable to technical failures, cyber attacks and invasions of privacy https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d

localize.full_text: 无现金社会的效率会更高，但也更容易受到技术故障、网络攻击和侵犯隐私的侵害https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d。
無現金社會的效率會更高，但也更容易受到技術故障、網絡攻擊和侵犯隱私的侵害https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d。

next.title: In France, last spring's lockdown increased the gap in exam scores between normal schools and ones in hard-up areas by several points https://t.co/vZ9bmc1Do0

localize.full_text: 在法国，去年春天的封锁使正常学校和困难地区学校的考试成绩差距增加了几个百分点https://t.co/vZ9bmc1Do0。
在法國，去年春天的封鎖使正常學校和困難地區學校的考試成績差距增加了幾個百分點https://t.co/vZ9bmc1Do0。
